channel.title: Leadership on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Leadership on Greg Herlein

item.title: Developing Leaders of Leaders in the post-COVID Era
item.description: I’ve been a “leader-of-leaders” for a long time. It’s changed post-covid. But when I talk to some Engineers about the difference between “Leader of Others” and “Leader of Leaders” they don’t know what I’m talking about. So I thought I’d blog about it, and maybe even learn more myself.

item.title: Dream Teams
item.description: A friend was telling me about “Dream Teams” at Netflix and I realized that is exactly what I have been trying to build/encourage around me. That is what I want!

item.title: Guest Appearance: Software Syndergy Podcast
item.description: I had a lot of fun being interviewed by James Holder for the Software Synergy Podcast. You can listen on Spotify or Apple.

item.title: September Update
item.description: Three months since I posted, so here’s some random thoughts and updates.

item.title: BrightSign!
item.description: What’s old is new again: I’ve joined BrightSign as their Head of Software Engineering!

item.title: Engineering Leadership 321
item.description: I’ve come to firmly believe that Engineering Leadership has a 3-2-1 principle to create Engineer happiness, which is a key prerequisite for high performance Engineering teams.
